/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings and skyscrapers, their glass facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding a dynamic element to the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly blue, green, and gray, painting a picture of a city that is both vibrant and serene.
